t: Erie Tool Works - History | VintageMachinery.org
s: Founded in 1902 by Frank Bacon, the company bought Hollands Manufacturing Co. in 1959. Their brand names were Empire and Erie Kit

t: Erie Tool Works
s: During the 1930s the company supplied Stillson-pattern pipe wrenches for the Sears Roebuck "Merit" brand and for a number of other tool companies as well. Production by Erie Tool Works can be easily recognized by the distinctive "Guaranteed" marking.
